item.title: Kyle
item.description: Howdy! My name is Kyle Erickson and I am a senior Technology Management student here at Texas A&M. I was born and raised in College Station and have lived here my whole life. I have been able to see plenty of people come and go out this townn over the years especially through the athletic programs. Still hopeful one of these days A&M will obtain a modern national championship trophy and national title in football.
